lead_paragraph: BMW Oracle Racing opened up a 3-point lead at the top of the Louis Vuitton Cup standings by beating Mascalzone Latino of Italy yesterday in Valencia, Spain. The undefeated Americans took the lead for good from the first wind marker after the Italians received a penalty.
